Name: Helltown
About the game: ​In Helltown , you play as a postman who has to deliver packages to the residents of a brand new residential development called Little Vale. However, when all hell breaks loose, you'll have to run away and hide from insidious monsters while trying to unravel the truth behind it all. In order to do so, talk to the townspeople and explore​ ​the game's many locations​.​ ​Will you be able to escape, or will you just be another lost soul trapped in... Helltown ​?​​ FEATURES Lots of scary monsters Various spooky locations A mysterious story to unravel 4 very different endings DOES NOT INCLUDE Generic Unity/Unreal Store assets Cheap jumpscares Laughable grammar
